title: NASA's InSight Gets a Few Extra Weeks of Mars Science
summary: The mission’s team has chosen to operate its seismometer longer than previously planned, although the lander will run out of power sooner as a result.

title: NASA counts down to within 29 seconds of launching the large SLS rocket
summary: "It was a long day for the team, but I think it was a very successful day."

title: House Appropriations Committee warns of cost pressures in Space Force programs
summary: The House Appropriations Committee in a report accompanying the fiscal year 2023 defense appropriations bill warned about schedule and cost risks in Space Force acquisition programs.

title: NASA Announces Artemis Concept Awards for Nuclear Power on Moon
summary: NASA and the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) are working together to advance space nuclear technologies.

title: Through Starling, NASA will test complex swarm operations
summary: NASA is preparing to launch Starling, its first satellite swarm. Instead of communicating directly with the four Starling cubesats, mission operators will send instructions to the swarm as a single entity.
